tool_description: Processes multiple documents simultaneously with parallel processing, progress tracking, and error handling for large document collections.

input_directory.description: Directory path containing documents to process

output_directory.description: Directory path for processed output files

max_parallel_jobs.description: Maximum number of parallel processing jobs (1-16)

skip_errors.description: Continue processing other files when errors occur

create_manifest.description: Create a processing manifest file with results

error_messages: Input directory not found: The specified input directory does not exist.
Output directory creation failed: Cannot create or access the specified output directory.
No matching files found: No files match the specified patterns in the input directory.
Invalid parallel job count: max_parallel_jobs must be between 1 and 16.
Processing interrupted: Batch processing was interrupted due to system error.
Insufficient disk space: Not enough disk space available for output files.
usage: Provide input_directory and output_directory paths. Specify file_patterns to filter documents, adjust max_parallel_jobs for performance, and enable recursive for subdirectory processing.

total_files_found.description: Total number of files matching the patterns

files_failed.description: Number of files that failed processing

failed_files.description: List of files that failed to process

manifest_path.description: Path to the generated processing manifest file
